author: kfogel
msg: Patch from Sander Striker, who didn't have time to commit it himself:
* subversion/clients/cmdline/util.c
(svn_cl__edit_externally): Protect the file arg with double quotes,
so it's one argument when run by system.

author: kfogel
msg: Incorporate Greg Stein's review of revision 2637 (saving time for Ben,
who's working on the Handbook):
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/liveprops.c
(dav_svn_insert_prop): Use APR_OFF_T_FMT.

author: philip
msg: * tools/dev/stress.pl (check_out): Remove '-d' from checkout command.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/mod_dav_svn/update.c
(dav_svn__update_report): No longer URI-decode "dst-path" values,
since dav_svn_simple_parse_uri handles this for us.

author: sussman
msg: Cool DAV tricks.
I noticed that when mounting an svn repository as a "Webfolder" (on
Win32 or Nautilus) that the file-size, file-type, and mod-time columns
were always blank.  Looking in ethereal, it turns out that mod_dav_svn
wasn't generating any PROPFIND responses for the most common DAV:
properties.
Anyway, it was trivial to fix;  now our repositories look more like
real filesystems when mounted over DAV.  Yay.
* liveprops.c (dav_svn_props[]):  uncomment getcontentlength,
getcontenttype, getlastmodified properties.
(dav_svn_insert_prop): add response generation for the properties.
